name: Ashritha Sai Mani Chundru
headline: I build learning-based robotic systems that reason about human motion, dynamics, and sensing limits.
subheadline: MSc Human & Biological Robotics, Imperial College London
stance: I care less about flashy models and more about whether systems fail loudly, predictably, and usefully.

highlights.title: ANVYA
highlights.text: Representation-guided scientific visualization engine for molecular structures (AlphaFold + SMILES + PyMOL).

highlights.title: Human3D
highlights.text: Context-aware 3D human reconstruction pipeline with differentiable biomechanical constraints.

highlights.title: Smart India Hackathon Winner
highlights.text: Adaptive prosthesis control with EEG preprocessing and stabilised real-time servo execution.
